## Samples / Misc
- EU5_ALL_MODIFIERS_SAMPLE.txt
- 00_README.txt

Notes:
- Guides summarize wiki content; use them for quick syntax and best practices.
- Official references are the authoritative dumps; prefer these when verifying exact keys/fields.
- Keep both sets; they serve different purposes.
